line.text: As an unperfect actor on the stage
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who with his fear is put beside his part
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or some fierce thing replete with too much rage
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whose strength abundance weakens his own heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So I for fear of trust forget to say
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The perfect ceremony of love rite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in mine own love strength seem to decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Oercharged with burthen of mine own love might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O let my looks be then the eloquence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And dumb presagers of my speaking breast
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who plead for love and look for recompense
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: More than that tongue that more hath more expressed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O learn to read what silent love hath writ
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To hear with eyes belongs to love fine wit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
